Index.title: Camera QR Reader
Index.scanReadyDesc: Place a QR code in front of your camera to automatically detect and read its content.
Index.guideScanDesc: Real-time QR code recognition via webcam. Auto-detects URL types with one-click copy. For scanned image links, enter image editing mode.
Index.guideGenDesc: Enter text/link or upload files (Ctrl+V to paste screenshots) to create HD QR codes. Download as PNG for sharing.
Index.guideShareDesc: Easily transfer long text, WiFi passwords, or links from your computer to your mobile device by scanning the screen.
Index.iosDesc: One shortcut, multiple triggers. Unlock the full potential of cross-device transfer.
Index.shortcut1Desc: Trigger via system share menu to upload images/files to cloud and generate QR code for PC to scan.
Index.shortcut2Desc: Run manually to choose: 'Clipboard to QR' for PC to scan, or 'Scan to Clipboard' to get PC content.
Index.toastUploadFailed: Upload failed. Please check console for details.
Index.authModalDesc: Please enter the access password to upload files.
Index.shortCodeTooltip: Convert long content to a short link for cleaner QR codes
